description: This file defines a utility function 'cn' used for conditional class name concatenation, typically used in React or frontend frameworks to dynamically compose class names based on conditions.

methods.name: export function cn(...classes: Array<string | undefined | false | null>) { cn
methods.description: Concatenates class names conditionally, filtering out falsy values, undefined, null, or false, and joining the remaining with spaces.

ctags.name: cn
ctags.pattern: /^export function cn(...classes: Array<string | undefined | false | null>) {$/
